attributes.action: Make it illegal for taxpayer funded organisations to keep secret details of payments such as gagging orders or out of court settlements.
attributes.additional_details: Taxpayers money is used in the most dubious of circumstances to keep people quiet when taxpayer funded organisations break the law or high level taxpayer funded employees wish to avoid being exposed as having failed in their responsibililties.  It MUST be against all of the Human Rights Act for taxpayers to be deprived of information regarding how their taxpayer pounds are being criminally  misappropriated by individuals to protect themselves.  IT CAN NEVER BE IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST TO KEEP DETAILS ABOUT PAYMENTS OF TAXPAYER POUNDS SECRET FROM THE TAXPAYER AND IT MUST BE STOPPED.
